properties.description: We would love to welcome you to King's! Our community welcome cafe runs on Mondays during term time from 11am to 2pm. Meet together for chat, refreshments, board games, activities and an optional lunch. Enter through our back doors on St John's Street.

properties.description: Come to our Community Hot-Spot for free unlimited hot drinks and biscuits, free wi-fi and use of laptops, plus books, card games, board games, puzzle books, jigsaws etc. Plus free soup and and the best toasted sandwiches in NR3 served from 12-1pm.
properties.title: Catton Grove Community Centre Community Hot-Spot

properties.address: St. Andrews Church Hall, Norwich, Norfolk NR4 6NW
properties.description: The Community Cafe is open to all
properties.title: Community Cafe

properties.address: Christ Church, Norwich, Norfolk NR3 4LA
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 8th January 2024** We welcome you to join us for our Community Hotspot on the second and fourth Monday of each month, beginning 8th January 2024. On the second Monday of each month, join us for a reminiscence session where we talk about all things life, from back in the day. On the fourth Monday of each month, listen to a short story followed by an opportunity to swap some of your old books. At both sessions, we will be providing hot drinks and food, such as sandwiches and cakes. We will also have a selection of information available about our services at Age UK Norwich.
properties.title: Community Hotspot: Reminiscence and Storytelling

properties.address: Jubilee Community Centre, Norwich, Norfolk NR1 2EX
properties.description: Monthly Community Cafe on the first Tuesday of every month. For people over 65. Free simple hot meal, tea, coffee, snacks. Meet new people and get advice and info from our charity partners. Free transport available in the local area from Norwich Door to Door - call 01603 776735 and mention Corton House Community Cafe!
properties.title: Corton House Community Cafe

properties.description: FREE EVENTS: Snack 'n' Chat is held every 3rd Thursday of each month, 12pm-1:30pm. All are welcome to come and enjoy refreshments, short talk and a light lunch. Little Seeds Playgroup for 0-4 year olds with parent/guardian every Wednesday during term time, 10am-12pm. To attend please sign up via the Eventbrite link posted on Little Seeds Facebook Group which goes live after 6pm the day before. Servant's Church service every Sunday at 4pm - all welcome.
properties.title: Hillcrest Chapel

properties.address: Horsford Church Room, Norfolk NR10 3DE
properties.description: The church room is in the middle of the village of Horsford, easily accessible from the Holt Road. Parking available for approximately 20 cars. There is heating, a small kitchen, 2 accessible toilets & baby changing facilities. A well known community asset that meets this specific need.
properties.title: Horsford Church Room

properties.address: St Georges Church Colegate, Norfolk NR3 1DA
properties.description: We are a church that offers a community coffee morning; 10.30-13.00 every Wednesday, offering consistently, a warm place to meet and hang out, with food, drinks, support and friendship. It's about building community - all of us supporting each other and contributing by being there - and it's a beautiful thing.
properties.title: Hot Spot Community Coffee Morning

properties.address: MAP - The Risebrow Centre, Chantry Road, Norwich, Norfolk NR2 1RF
properties.description: A warm space to access advice for those aged 11-25; Access free advice, hot and cold drinks, food and a safe space. Our Warm Space is stocked with hot and cold drinks, snacks and warm winter items. We play music, you can get creative with some mindful colouring. If you want advice or support, just speak to reception or any MAP staff. We’re there to help! We know we cannot solve this financial crisis and mental health emergency ourselves, but we can build something powerful and positive – together. No-one should be cold and on their own, so come and visit our Warm Space today. Our Warm Spaces are open on the following days and times: Norwich – The Risebrow Centre, Chantry Road, Norwich NR2 1RF - Monday to Friday between 13:30 and 17:00
properties.title: MAP - Warm Space

properties.address: Wymondham Abbey, Wymondham, NR18 0PH
properties.description: Wymondham Abbey is open to the public every day between 10AM and 3PM offering a warm space to seek comfort, conversation, free refreshment, WIFI and maybe just a quiet place to reflect on life's challenges. The Abbey Hall is also open at various times throughout the week to host the Wymondham Foodbank (Tue Sat mornings), Citizen's Advice (Mon morning), Sunday community lunches (monthly) our Parish Nurse sessions (16 hours / week) as well as various other community sessions, all free of charge.
